descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

[center][size=30]Informative Standing Stones[/size][/center]
I have altered the description of each Standing Stone so as to include the actual information pertaining to the status effects each has on the player when each respective sign is selected. I have also omitted the unnecessary repetition of the statement “You may only have one sign at a time” from all stones, for two reasons. The first reason is that the statement is so obvious, that it goes without saying. The second reason is because of the Aetherial Crown, (a Dawnguard addition) which you can create at the Aetherium Forge as one of three possible rewards for completing the 'Lost to the Ages' Quest. It retains the power of your previous Standing Stone power, when you choose one, meaning that while you wear it you can have two Standing Stone powers active at the same time. With this mod, when view a Standing Stone, you will see the specific level of change to your stants, rather than the simple messages such as "You heal faster."

Drail3 mods are light weight by design. This means that none of my mods will make your game lag or drop your fps. My mods are script free and have one goal, which is to assist you in making the most of your character development. The Informative Series is a set of mods that explain how Skyrim works in greater depth than Bethesda provided in the Help Menu or interactive objects. So far, the [i]Informative Series[/i] is composed of the following.

I thank you all very much for taking the time to view my mods. Please comment and endorse if you enjoy them. If you would like to use any of my mods as part of your own, you need only ask, and give me credit.
